pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4

definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Olympic Organizing Committee/abbr. to 奧組委|奥组委
pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4 Zu3 zhi1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會

sentences.english: Each Olympic Games, is the Greek festival of people .
sentences.chinese: 每一屆奧林匹克運動會，都是全希臘人民的節日。

sentences.english: Blessed are the balanced; they shall outlast everyone. One of the events in the summer Olympics is the pentathlon.
sentences.chinese: 夏季奧林匹克運動會中，有一個項目是五項全能運動。

sentences.english: I’m fortunate because this will be my fourth time participating in the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 我很幸運，因爲這將是我第四次參加奧林匹克運動會。

sentences.english: But make no mistake; Gasol and Bryant are totally geeked about the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 了，加索爾和科比在奧林匹克運動會上完全沒經驗。

sentences.english: The summer Olympics consists of 28 sports with 38 disciplines.
sentences.chinese: 夏季奧林匹克運動會包括28個大項，38個小項。

sentences.english: My wish is to go to Beijing to watch the Olympic Games in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 我的願望是2008年去北京觀看奧林匹克運動會。

sentences.english: These teams are going to try out for the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 這些隊伍要參加奧林匹克運動會的選拔賽。

sentences.english: In my view, first of all, the Olympic Game represents the spirit of sports.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，奧林匹克運動會首先代表了體育的精神。

sentences.english: She started the Special Olympics for athletes with mental disabilities.
sentences.chinese: 她爲智障運動員開創了特殊奧林匹克運動會。

sentences.english: How many countries competed in the ancient Olympic Games?
sentences.chinese: 有幾多國家參加古代奧林匹克運動會？

sentences.english: Horse racing can be traced to the Ol'ympic Games of about' 600 B. C.
sentences.chinese: 賽馬可追溯到公元前600年前的奧林匹克運動會。

sentences.english: In 2000, the city of Sidney held the 27th Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 在2000年，西妮拿着第27奧林匹克運動會。

sentences.english: Old China took part in the Olympics three times in the past.
sentences.chinese: 舊中國在過去曾參加三次奧林匹克運動會。

sentences.english: China is the host of The Eleventh Asian Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 中國是第十一屆亞洲奧林匹克運動會的主辦國。

sentences.english: The Summer Olympic Games take place in Beijing from 8-24 August.
sentences.chinese: 夏季奧林匹克運動會於8月8日至24日北京舉行。

sentences.english: They were held at Olympia in Greece every four years.
sentences.chinese: 奧林匹克運動會每四年在希臘的奧林姆匹亞舉辦一次。

definition: the right to host (an international meeting)

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委

pinyin: rong2 yu4 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4
